fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Add a charge to your Unblast.
- Unblast a player, as well as the amount of adjecent players equal to twice the amount of charges your Unblast has, 1 on each side. All Unblasted players will gain Invincible Defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only carry up to 3 charges at once.
- Dead/Missing players will not be skipped over when the Unblast is targeting adjacent players.
- The player list wraps around, meaning that Player 1 is considered to be next to the highest numbered player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent at least 8 deaths throughout the course of the game using your Unblasts. Saving the same person multiple times will count towards this goal.
